name: Joshua de Jong
title: Software Engineer
welcome: I work as a Software Engineer at Expeditors Seattle for the Enterprise Monitoring team. I have a strong understanding of software development and have been helping the team support their legacy products. My work has been responsible for significant stability and performance improvements to the codebase. I also been instrumental for releasing an new Elasticsearch based monitoring solution for the company.
I am always seeking to challenge myself and learn new skills. If you feel I might be the right person for your team feel free to reach out!
You can find me on LinkedIn, or see my repositories here.
summary: I am a detailed-oriented, responsible and committed engineer, with a get-it-done, on-time and top-quality product spirit. Experienced with defining requirements, designing, and implementation of complex projects in high paced environments.

details: Planned and led weekly meetings for 25+ undergraduate students that engaged students to learn complex mathematical topics in creative ways.
Actively identified and secured key speakers from industry and academics to present at events.

experience.title: Software Engineer
details: Exponentially improved the performance and stability of mission critical code, reduced 250 minutes of computation to 1 minute per a day.
Created and maintained fully automated, highly available, zero downtime release CI/CD pipelines using Gitlab and Maven.
Improved response time, customer satisfaction, and alleviated work loads by automating common tasks using Python.
Built automated test frameworks for config files and Logstash pipelines, improving stability and maintainability.
Maintained and decreased the cost of support for multiple legacy applications in Java, C, Python, and Bash by adding features, improving testing coverage, refactoring, and updating architecture.

experience.title: Junior Data Analyst
details: Implemented an item recommendation system based off of a customer's current shopping cart using scikit-learn.
Forecasted company's growth and measured the success of advertising campaigns through the use of A/B Testing.
Developed and maintained operational reports and dashboards to monitor sales and inventory using Plotly Dash.
Scraped, wrangled, and analyzed data from competitor's websites to competitively price products using BeautifulSoup, Selenium, and Pandas.

experience.title: Research Assistant
details: Developed a machine vision tool set to aid in analysis and accurate empirical data collection of chemical reactions.
Modeled experiments and verified the model's integrity with PDE's, regressions, and cross-validation.
Created and maintained a relational database using SQLite to store experiments and analytics for future enquiries.
Dynamically approached problems with a team and taught statistical modeling techniques to junior researchers.
